# InDesign DevEnv
---

Adobe InDesign-Plugin development environment list.

## Support

Twitter:@Kwaishi2 

---
## Privacy policy

** App：InDesign DevEnv **

このアプリによって、お客様の個人情報ならびにプライバシーに関わる情報を収集しません。

With this application, we will not gather information about your personal information and privacy.
